channel.title: Changing port on a 508?
channel.description:
I know how to change the port that the server logs into to on a 317, but how do you do it on a 508?
I need to do this because I host 2 servers on my computer, so I need one to be a different port so that it will work.
On 317's to change the port you goto into Server.Java and change "43594" to "43595" and in Server.ini you change the "43594" to "43595" which is easy enough.
But, i completly hate the way that 508's are set up so, could someone who knows more about 508's please answer this problem for me?
I would be very gracious :D
- haxifix
